client.models.permission 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : permission.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/2/26 10:36
@Description : 权限相关
"""
from django.contrib.postgres.fields import ArrayField
from django.db import models

from client.models.base import BaseModel, NameAndDescNameModel
from client.models.role import Platform, Role



[文档]class PermissionCategory(NameAndDescNameModel):

    def __str__(self):
        return self.desc_name

    class Meta:
        db_table = "permission_category"
        verbose_name = "权限分类表"




[文档]class Permission(BaseModel):

    code = models.CharField(
        max_length=200,
        verbose_name="英文代码"
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        verbose_name="中文名称"
    )
    path = ArrayField(
        models.CharField(
            max_length=20,
            verbose_name="英文代码"
        ),
        default=list,
        blank=True,
        verbose_name="权限节点路径"
    )
    is_deleted = models.BooleanField(
        default=False,
        verbose_name="是否已经被删除，默认未删除"
    )
    platform = models.ForeignKey(
        Platform,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="权限所属平台"
    )
    permission_category = models.ForeignKey(
        PermissionCategory,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="权限分类"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "permission"
        verbose_name = "权限表"




[文档]class RolePermission(BaseModel):
    permission = models.ForeignKey(
        Permission,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="权限"
    )
    role = models.ForeignKey(
        Role,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="权限"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "role_permission"
        verbose_name = "角色权限表"
